titles.title: A bill for the relief of Paulette Mendes-Silva.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1069.

action.text: H.R. 3911 passed in Senate relating to this measure.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/30/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia to hear, determine, and render judgment on any claim of a named individual against the United States for personal injuries allegedly resulting from the administration of an inoculation.
